content: need to make major changes to the size you ll want to do it by increasing or decreasing by 8 stitches minor changes in size can easily be made by simply keeping the stitch count the same and going up or down in needle size a note regarding color choice this pattern looks beautiful with two colors that contrast with each other nicely you can also use up scrap yarn by keeping the same main background color and switching the cc with each section of cells for a fun and colorful hat let your imagination go wild nucleus beanie pattern ©blue barn fiber
